## pickJsonObject() function

Picks a nested [JsonObject](./ts-json-base.jsonobject.md) from a supplied [JsonObject](./ts-json-base.jsonobject.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function pickJsonObject(src: JsonObject, path: string): Result<JsonObject>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

<tbody><tr><td>

src


</td><td>

[JsonObject](./ts-json-base.jsonobject.md)


</td><td>

The [object](./ts-json-base.jsonobject.md) from which the field is to be picked.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

path


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Dot-separated path of the member to be picked.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Result&lt;[JsonObject](./ts-json-base.jsonobject.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the property if the path is valid and the value is an object. Returns `Failure` with details if an error occurs.
